description:
Top-rated app with trusted reference content from Dictionary.com & Thesaurus.com. WORKS OFFLINE - no Internet connection needed when searching words. 

Features:
Top-rated app with trusted reference content from Dictionary.com & Thesaurus.com. WORKS OFFLINE - no Internet connection needed when searching words.

Features:
• English Dictionary and Thesaurus - over 2,000,000 definitions, synonyms & antonyms
• Offline access – no Internet connection needed for most content
• Daily content, including Word of the Day, slideshows & our blog
• Audio pronunciations
• Voice search (five free searches included)
• Favorite words
• Search history
• Spelling suggestions
• Popular & local trending searches
• Word origin & history
• Translator with over 30 languages, perfect for ESL and reliable translations into English
• 850,000 Example Sentences (available for purchase, or included in our Premium app) 
• Medical Dictionary (available for purchase, or included in our Premium app) 
• Science Dictionary (available for purchase, or included in our Premium app) 
• Encyclopedia, Rhymes, Idioms and Slang content (available for purchase, or included in our Premium app) 

Note: All above additional content in app purchases are now available for one low price in our Premium app! 

Tip: To turn Word of the Day notifications on or off, go to Settings > Notifications > Dictionary and toggle On or Off.
releaseNotes:
1.Fun new Word of the Day Quiz widget - iOS 8
2.Favorites cloud issue fixed! Access all your old favorites and continue syncing
3.Enhanced for iOS 8
4.New Word of the Day images 

NOTE: When you first launch the app favorites will sync with iCloud but may take a few minutes.
